data.meta_description: Persia White, American actress, musician, singer & member of the industrial rock band XEO3. She is best known for her role as Lynn Searcy on the sitcom Girlfriends. Her other acting roles include The Vampire Diaries, Dysfunctional Friends, & Breaker High. A vegan, she has co-produced the award-winning doc Earthlings and was honored Humanitarian of the Year by PETA. Previously married to slam poet Saul Williams, she is currently married to English actor Joseph Morgan.
